dmca.title: Stolen material found on website
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: Philip Doolittle [mailto:pldoolittle@odordestroyer.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, July 26, 2005 2:55 PM
To: Webhost@eCatDomain.com; mhick@telus.net; admin@saleshack.com;
postmaster@ecatdomain.co; abuse@ecatdomain.com; klec9780@runestone.net;
klicker@warpdriveonline.com
Cc: abuse@theplanet.com; legal@theplanet.com; admins@theplanet.com
Subject: Stolen material found on website
Importance: High

The following link points to a page on the website eCatDomain.com containing
stolen copyrighted material. The article in question is was lifted verbatim
from our website without permission.  We have asked that they remove the
material in question, and have been met with no response.

You are being notified because your relationship with this site.  Please be
aware that unless this material is removed from eCatDomain.com site within
24 hours we will take all steps neccesary to stop further dissemination of
the article in question.  These steps may include actions against yourself
as a contributing partner to eCatDomain.com

You have been notified, please govern yourself accordingly.

Sincerely,
Philip Doolittle
(770) 460 - 0469
http://www.OdorDestroyer.com



Article in question:
http://www.ecatdomain.com/viewarticle.php?id=9&PHPSESSID=cbbc79d8743bf312f8b
